Genre: Thriller, Drama, Detective

Cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Mark Ruffalo, Ben Kingsley, Max von Sydow, Michelle Williams, Emily Mortimer, Patricia Clarkson, Jackie Earle Haley, Ted Levine, John Carroll Lynch, Elias Koteas

About movie:
Two American judicial police officer sent to one of the islands in Massachusetts, to investigate the disappearance of the patient's hospital for the insane criminals. In its investigation, they will have to face the web of lies, a hurricane struck and fatal riot slum clinic, who throw them on the island, as in a trap.
